tool_description: Calculates precise macronutrient ratios, caloric distribution, and metabolizable energy values on both as-fed and dry matter basis.

cup_weight_grams.description: Weight of one cup in grams

error_messages: Invalid nutritional values: All percentages must be between 0 and 100
Inconsistent values: Sum of minimum protein, fat, and maximum fiber cannot exceed dry matter
Invalid caloric data: calories_per_cup must be positive
Invalid cup weight: cup_weight_grams must be between 50 and 500 grams
usage: Provide all guaranteed analysis values and calories_per_cup. Optionally specify cup_weight_grams and carbohydrate_estimate for more precise calculations.

dry_matter_protein.description: Protein percentage on dry matter basis

dry_matter_fat.description: Fat percentage on dry matter basis
